rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a North-facing door leading directly to the courtyard. Designed in a Brutalist style, featuring exposed concrete structures and minimalistic finishes.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North facing entrance as per Vastu is auspicious for prosperity.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large living area featuring industrial materials and open space layout typical of Brutalist design. Large windows to the courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, offering an expansive dining space with a kitchenette.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: A deluxe bedroom suite including master bed, en-suite bathroom, and walk-in closet. Walls built in exposed concrete to reflect Brutalist style.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: One of the guest bedrooms with ample space and natural light from the courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another guest bedroom designed in a similar style as Guest Bedroom 1, ensuring symmetry and balance.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A robust, North-facing entrance designed in a Brutalist style with reinforced concrete and minimalistic detailing.

openings.name: Window to Courtyard
openings.location: South wall of living room and dining area
openings.description: Large windows that provide ample natural light from the central courtyard, ensuring a blend of indoor and outdoor spaces.

openings.name: Courtyard Access
openings.location: Between living room and dining area
openings.description: An opening leading to the central courtyard for natural ventilation and communal space.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space located on the upper floor, designed with an open plan layout and soundproofing elements.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: A versatile room for family gatherings and leisure activities. Features a relaxed seating area with industrial design elements.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.location: Northwest corner of the upper floor
openings.description: A central staircase connecting the ground and upper floors in a minimalistic design.

openings.name: Upper Floor Balcony Access
openings.description: Provides access to an external balcony for additional outdoor space.

rooms.name: Study/Reading Area
rooms.description: A quiet area designed for reading and studying. This zone complements the home office with a focus on light and air flow.

openings.name: Mezzanine Opening
openings.location: Between Home Office and Family Room
openings.description: An open walkway connecting the study area to other upper floor spaces.

notes.brutalist_design_elements: Exposed concrete structure, monolithic forms, and industrial detailing.
notes.vastu_principles: The North-facing entrance is designed according to Vastu for prosperity and positive energy flow. Courtyard placement ensures balance in spatial orientation.
